summary: A training script that sets up and runs a hybrid automatic speech recognition and text‑to‑speech model, allowing the use of paired audio‑text data together with pure text corpora. It configures the ASR component, integrates a pre‑trained TTS model, optional enhancer, BPE tokenizer, and manages experiment logging and checkpointing.
business_intent: To enable developers and researchers to improve speech recognition accuracy by leveraging synthetic speech generated from large text‑only datasets, while providing a flexible, configurable pipeline for multimodal ASR‑TTS training and experiment tracking.
